snippet.title: Treasures of the Aegean - Trailer
snippet.description:
#TreasuresoftheAegean #NumskullPresents #NumskullGames
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1607530/
Find out more: http://numskullgames.com/project/treasures-of-the-aegean/

Platforms: Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4/PlayStation 5, Xbox One/Series X/S, and Steam.
Release Date:  2021
Treasures of the Aegean is a non-linear action-adventure game, where players must explore and decipher the secrets of a mysterious island to escape from the time loop they’re trapped in.

The island is presented as a huge 2D open-world and players can freely roam using smooth parkour mechanics. However, time is ticking as the island is unstable and sinks within a limited amount of time. Inspired by fantasy thriller comics, the game borrows a unique European comic album aesthetic with a plot based on historical events.
